name: NATS JetStream Key-Value 最小
description: JetStream KV を作成して put/get。

files.template:
const { connect } = require('nats');
(async ()=>{ const nc = await connect({ servers: '{{server}}' }); const js = await nc.jetstream(); const kv = await js.views.kv('config'); await kv.put('hello', Buffer.from('world')); const v = await kv.get('hello'); console.log(v.string()); await nc.drain(); })();
